participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and creative, Alex enjoys immersing themselves in art and culture while also being a passionate cook.
participant_1.background: I'm single, and I enjoy cooking for myself. I enjoy going to museums. I'm proud of my sister and her growing family. My favorite websites are about home improvement and computer programming. I'm not sure how my family would react if I told them I was gay, but I know that I'm proud of who I am and who I love.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Energetic and outgoing, Jordan loves to connect with others and seek adventure in everyday life.
participant_2.background: I like to keep in touch with my friends and family on social media, but I don't spend all my time on it. I prefer to listen to music that gets my blood pumping and gets me ready to take on the day. I take a moment to myself and listen to some calming music. I always have a beer after work. I like to make boats on the weekends.

content.text: Hello! I'm glad to meet you.
Hello! Nice to meet you too! What do you like to do for fun?
I love to cook, go to museums, and spend time with my family.
That's great! I love to keep in touch with my friends and family on social media.
That's a great way to stay connected! I prefer to use email and text.
I like to do that too, but I also like to use social media to share photos and videos.
That's a great way to share memories! I love to go to museums too.
Me too! I love to learn about new cultures and see different art.
That's great! I love to learn about new things too.
I like the Museum of Modern Art in New York City.
That's a great museum! I've been there once and it was amazing.
I've been there a few times and it's always amazing. I love the modern art.
I love the modern art too! It's so different and interesting.
It is! I love to see how artists interpret the world around them.
